name: Hacked Omni-Tek Gunship
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ Omni-Tek Gunships can be found as chestloot in missions and from the Collector #L "Omni-Tek Gunship" "96095" #L "Advanced Hacker Tool" "87814" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Omni-Tek Gunship + Advanced Hacker Tool = #L "Hacked Omni-Tek Gunship" "286234" Skills: | No skills required. Hacker Tool gets used up in the process and its QL does not matter |
